resources.string:
Surf to any DigiTech RP155, RP250 or RP255 patch file and click on it to launch it in this viewer. (If you cannot open patch files from your stock browser, use Firefox for Android.)

Alternatively, use a file browser app.

RP255 patch files are supported, with RP155 and RP250 patch files as beta, but send me an email if you'd like to help me support your DigiTech multi-effects pedal! (Some manual data entry required.)

If you have a RP155 or RP250 patch file that does not open properly, with missing values, email me and I'll update the app.

The author has no affiliation with DigiTech or Harman. This app is possible because the DigiTech RP-series patch files are in a human-readable XML format.

DigiTech Patch Viewer v1.1
© 2012 Albert Ng
